content: handles start with a chain of 101 sts rust goes green jill chatelain 6/2008 rev 3/10 all rights reserved button loop make 20 st chain leave a long tail to use to sew loop to bag single_crochet into back loop of 2nd chain from hook repeat across chain 19 single_crochet end leaving a long tail to use to sew loop to bag finishing fold loop in half with tapestry needle sew loop to outside center of one side of the bag sew button to other side of bag top handles from center 3 double_crochet of the front of the bag count 15 double_crochet to the left and sew one side of handle to outside count 15 double_crochet to the right and sew the other side of the handle to the outside repeat on back side of the bag with the other handle note please send any comments to jillsknit@comcast net or jillsknit on ravelry hope you enjoy your green market bag even if it isn t rust rust goes green jill chatelain 6/2008 rev 3/10 all rights reserved
